title: Use cnorm for CursorVisibility::Visible
body:
The `CursorVisible` capability corresponds to `cvvis`, which doesn't work in tmux, but also isn't the right thing to use.  We should be using `cnorm` instead.

See https://github.com/markbt/streampager/issues/37.

title: windows: Add option to treat left ctrl-alt as altgr
body:
The previous behavior was to always treat ctrl-alt as altgr on Windows,
this has been done to better support altgr through a VNC session,
but this is very unintuitive when you don't need this behavior.

Closes #472

title: wayland: do not create OpenGL context before the configure event
body:
The existing code seems to use "configure" for just resizes, so introduce a "start" flag in pending events to handle the initial configure.

---

Sort of fixes #476, not the fontconfig issue from there that I can't reproduce though

title: Fix typo
body: "will will" -> "you will"

title: Add Ctrl-u in search mode to clear the current search pattern
body:
This is a small addition to the search mode (until keys for this mode are configurable :eyes:).

Ctrl-u is a common key in shells, vim, readline to clear the input buffer, and I use it often.

title: Add some missing option doc
body:
- automatically_reload_config
- check_for_updates
- check_for_updates_interval_seconds
- show_update_window
- allow_square_glyphs_to_overflow_width
- scroll_to_bottom_on_input
- selection_word_boundary

Part of #461

title: Remove unnecessary Result in config
body: I saw this while doing #459

title: Add cli option --config-file
body:
It works! :tada: 

I didn't find a documentation for global flags/options, is it currently missing?

I'm not fond of the duplication between wezterm/wezterm-gui/wezterm-mux-server.. But this is a larger problem I think, it shouldn't be solved in this PR.

For the implementation
- I extracted the existing config load logic to a function that takes a Path, and make it used when the flag is given.

- I changed the signature of `reload` (to avoid having `reload()` and `reload_from_path(path)` functions), to take a `ConfigFileSelection` (not sure about the naming), to choose between searching the config file or using a given one.

title: doc: Update ClearScrollback default value
body: Since latest release, but it seems it wasn't updated here

title: Add `dual` fonts
body:
Dual spaced fonts (despite the name) are also monospaced fonts. This PR will allow 
to use fonts like Iosevka Term (That's mainly why I'm doing it 😄).

title: Only disable drop shadow on macOS when window background opacity is transparent
body:
as title.

see #310 

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/409951/106346474-50694b80-626c-11eb-9614-fcdbf88bd9c3.mov

title: Add erase mode to ClearScrollback action
body:
The new erase mode `ScrollbackAndViewport` clears all lines, both visible and those scrolled off the top of the viewport, making the prompt line the new first line and resetting the scrollbar thumb to the full height of the window.

This is the behavior that Hyper / xterm has for clearing the terminal.

https://github.com/xtermjs/xterm.js/blob/28bcd88fb0f7d32c686461dc4594996d1877920e/src/browser/Terminal.ts#L1169-L1187

title: Add config option to specify default current working directory
body: Specifies the default current working directory for the initially spawned program.

title: Add Sync marker to child process created through pty spawn
body:
This will also allow sharing references of the process across different threads. I need this to share state between different threads.

I don't think that this will break any existing behaviour, from what I've seen (and from what the compiler tells) every data structure in there is `Sync` compatible.

title: Reduce compile memory required by vtparse
body: Instead of 3800MB, let's top out at ~220 :) Probably raises MSRV, though. Also, untested.

title: Fix get-deps on arch
body: cheeky little missing backslash.

title: Instruct docs.rs to build with widgets and serde features
body:
As seen in https://github.com/async-rs/async-std/blob/master/Cargo.toml#L20-L22

That way, docs.rs will have the `Widget` struct documentation available.

title: docs: update default keybinding info for CloseCurrentTab w/ its boolean param
body: CloseCurrentTab now takes a boolean parameter (confirm), but the default keybinding table in the docs hasn't been updated to reflect that.

title: add WezTerm-macos-* to gitignore
body: Ignore the `WezTerm-macos-*` folders being created on **build**.

title: Update snapshot tests to use k9@0.10.0
body:
I'm gradually improving snapshot testing macro devx in k9 and preparing
to ship v1. Before i do this i'm changing the inline snapshot macro to be
just `snapshot!()` that takes `Debug` trait an an arg and figures out
serialization of it.

this project has just a few snapshot tests and is prefect to test the migration (if that's ok)

title: doc: Update matrix room url
body: It is using the new room name integration between matrix & gitter since they merged (see: https://matrix.org/blog/2020/09/30/welcoming-gitter-to-matrix)

title: build(deps): bump http_req from 0.6.1 to 0.7.1

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

body:
Bumps [http_req](https://github.com/jayjamesjay/http_req) from 0.6.1 to 0.7.1.
Release notes

Sourced from http_req's releases.

v0.7.1

  • update dependencies

v0.7.0

  • new post function
  • basic support for decoding chunked response
  • read body in one call when Content-Length is known and there is no timeout
  • implementation of std::error::Error for error types
  • update dependencies
Commits
  • d0bcdb6 v0.7.1
  • a0fe013 Merge pull request #43 from devashishdxt/update-deps
  • f67d89f Update dependencies
  • 1e0be0b finish up post fn
  • 1508eff add post fn
  • b951180 update docs
  • cdbc07f Merge pull request #40 from voidumbrella/master
  • 46b522e Merge pull request #42 from jayjamesjay/v0.7.0
  • 87898fe Impl std::error::Error for error types
  • a80c465 Merge pull request #38 from tsurai/v0.7.0
